guide.conclusion: When the drive through server tells you the amount owed after you place the order, prep the money before you pull forward to pay.

flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Utilizing this tip you will be able to hand the pre-packaged money to the drive-up window agent in one motion.
guide.introduction_rendered: Utilizing this tip you will be able to hand the pre-packaged money to the drive-up window agent in one motion.

lines.text: Fold the bill(s) lengthwise making a crisp corner.
lines.text_raw: Fold the bill(s) lengthwise making a crisp corner.

lines.text: Make another fold width-wise about 3/4" from the bottom end of the bill(s).
lines.text_raw: Make another fold width-wise about 3/4" from the bottom end of the bill(s).

lines.text: Prepare the exact change and insert it into the folds.
lines.text_raw: Prepare the exact change and insert it into the folds.

lines.text: Squeeze the bill/change packet at the fold and present to the drive through agent as a single monetary unit.
lines.text_raw: Squeeze the bill/change packet at the fold and present to the drive through agent as a single monetary unit.

guide.summary: Don't fumble with bills and coins when paying exact amounts for your fast food at drive-up windows.
guide.title: Currency Manager Tip for Drive-up Windows
